ygData.subject: Re: A new transformer...
ygData.msgSnippet: I did reply to Valtron, Kinger. I think it was post 17003. ... Zardus looks at Hot Rod and Cybershark, asserting what they could be good for. He finally nods.

I did reply to Valtron, Kinger. I think it was post 17003.

::Zardus/DevilDuer::

Zardus looks at Hot Rod and Cybershark, asserting what they could be good 
for. He finally nods. "Both of you will need quarters," he says, remembering 
that Battera didn't have any as her comm message arrives.

"I'll be right there," he says into his comm, "Set the CR chamber to put him 
in stasis."

He looks at HotRod, Cybershark, and Feline, walking off to the residential 
area and motioning for them to follow.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer smiles, watching the pod open. He looks over the femm as she 
emerges, glancing around when she asks her question.

"You're on past earth," he says, realizing that she probably didn't detect 
him. His hand stays near his gun, DevilDuer ready for battle just in case, 
"What faction are you?"
